createCandidateInJob.description: Create a candidate in the specified job

choices.description: The IDs of the choice(s) selected

data.description: The candidate's answer encoded in base64

fileUrl.description: A url pointing to the candidate's answer

value.description: The value may be an integer or a decimal number

coverLetter.description: The cover letter provided when the candidate applied

disqualified.description: Flag indicating whether the candidate is disqualified

school.description: The name of the school graduated

summary.description: The summary of the experience entry

title.description: The title of the experience entry

recruiterKey.description: The key corresponding to the recruiter who sourced the candidate

socialProfiles.description: A collection with social profiles of candidates

type.description: The slug name of the social profile

url.description: Url to the candidate's social profile page

username.description: The username of the social profile

shortCode.description: The shortcode of the job the candidate is applying to

sourced.description: Indicates if the candidate is sourced or applied

getJobQuestions.description: Get the questions associated with a job offer

choices.description: An array specifying the possible answers. Defined only for types multiple_choice and dropdown.

maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size in bytes. Defined only if question is file

required.description: specifies wether providing an answer to the question is required

singleAnswer.description: Wether the question allows for multiple answers. Defined only for type multiple_choice.

supportedFileTypes.description: An array specifying the accepted file types. Defined only if question type is file.

getJobQuestions.title: Get job questions

listCandidates.description: List the candidates for a job

createdAfter.description: Returns results created after the specified timestamp

email.description: The email of the candidate to filter by

limit.description: Specifies the number of candidates to try and retrieve per page

nextToken.description: Returns results with an ID greater than or equal to the specified ID

stage.description: The job's stage slug, can be retrieved from the '/stages' endpoint

updatedAfter.description: Returns results updated after the specified timestamp

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the candidate record

disqualified.description: Flag indicating whether the candidate is disqualified

anyOf.description: The date the candidate was moved to the hired stage

updateCandidate.description: Update an existing candidate. Omitted fields will remain unchanged.

educationEntries.description: Existing entries will be deleted if not included in the new array.

imageUrl.description: A url pointing to the candidate's image
